scripts.test:functional: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=functional codeceptjs run-multiple parallel --grep '(?=.*)^(?!.*(@smoke-tests|@flaky|@nightlyOnly))' --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:functional-nightly: yarn playwright install chromium && yarn playwright install firefox && yarn playwright install webkit && yarn playwright test --grep @nightly && codeceptjs run --grep "@fixed"
scripts.test:accessibility-nightly: yarn playwright install chromium && yarn playwright install firefox && yarn playwright install webkit && yarn playwright test  --grep @accessibility
scripts.test:smoke: yarn npm audit --recursive --environment production && MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=smoke REPORT_DIR=test-results/smokeTest REPORT_FILE=test-results/smokeTest/results.xml codeceptjs run --grep '@smoke-tests' --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
